product_name: Diamondback Lil Della Cruz 12" Girls' Bike - 2014
long_description: A great first bike, the Diamondback Lil Della Cruz 12 in. kids' bike features plenty of style and removable training wheels for budding riders. Sturdy steel frame and fork are built to handle the rigors of riding. Single-speed drivetrain with protective chainguard offers simplicity and low maintenance. Rear coaster brake eases the learning of the fine art of speed management; all kids have to do is simply backpedal to engage the brake. Double-springed saddle offers plush comfort. The Diamondback Micro Viper 12 in. kids' bike includes a set of heavy-duty, removable training wheels to get new riders started on the basics of balance. Stylish fenders help protect bike and rider from puddles and mud. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: A great first bike, the Diamondback Lil Della Cruz 12 in. kids' bike features plenty of style and removable training wheels for budding riders.
